snippet.title: Shine On, My Little Sun - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Wishlist https://store.steampowered.com/app/3032140/Shine_On_My_Little_Sun/

When the Sun fell, darkness covered the world. In the snowy wasteland, the town of Svargo thrived under its faint light. But the Sun did not go out. The small Sun sleeps atop a grim lighthouse. What happens when the Sun awakens, seeking a few days of simple childhood?

#visualnovel #trailer #videogames
